landan poth pradarshanayedi shri lanka kutiyata ihala prathicharashri lanka poth prakashakayange sangamaye bhandagarika haputhanthri premasiri ha ema sangamaye sabhapathi aariya wiraman, lanka poth welendan ha poth aanayana sangamaye sabhapathi mayils brohiyar ha ema sangamaye bhandagarika dinushi wiraman, shri lanka poth prakashakayange sangamaye upa sabhapathi wijitha yapa, intarnashanal buk hawushi niwtan piris, chandana mendis prakashana samagamehi chandana mendis, wijitha yapa pothhalehi peshan yapa saha lanka poth welendan ha poth aanayana sangamaye lekam chandru haputhanthri shri lanka pradarshana kutiya idiripasashri lanka poth prakashakayange sangamaya, lanka poth welendange ha poth aanayanakaruwange sangamaya saha apanayana sanwardhanaya mandalaya ekwa eksath rajadhaniye arls kot hi pawathwunu 2011 landan poth pradarshanayehi shri lanka kutiya sanwidhanaya karana ladi.shri lanka poth prakashakayan wisin mathakadi ingrisi, sinhala saha demala bhashawen prakashayata path kala poth ehi pradarshanaya kara thibini.
